creator: pmadhu_s@rediffmail.com
text:
Hi!
  Iam unable to connect to JRun4 App server, from Apacehe 2.0.54 & also Apache 
1.3.28

System Configuration used:
JRun4
apache_2.0.54-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi
Windows 2003 Operating System.
The error that i got after Configuring and restarting the Apache Server is
Windows could not start the Apache2 on Local Computer.For more 
information,review the System Event Log.If this is a non-Microsoft 
service,contact the service vendor,and refer to service-specific error code 1.
   Please let me know, how to fix this issue.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Sorry, this is not a support forum, please try a mailing list:
